fact_text: Hurricane FLORENCE As of 12:00 UTC Sep 04, 2018: Location: 19.4°N 41.8°W Maximum Winds: 65 kt Gusts: N/A Minimum Central Pressure: 990 mb Environmental Pressure: 1010 mb Radius of Circulation: 150 NM
11AM Update on Florence from the National Hurricane Center - strengthened to a Cat. 1 Hurricane, the 3rd hurricane of the Atlantic season so far. Still WAY out in the Atlantic.
